presentationColumns.name: Payment Distribution Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the payment distribution amount for AP Payments.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Payment Distribution Amount

presentationColumns.name: Payments Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total payments amount for the invoices and grain is payments or check number.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Payments Amount

presentationColumns.name: Avg Payment Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Payments Amount / Payments Count) * 100. And grain is payments or check number.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Avg Payment Amount

presentationColumns.name: Payments Document Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the payments document count and grain is payments or check number.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Payments Count

presentationColumns.name: Payments to Invoice Amount %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Payments Amount / Invoices Amount) * 100. This metric will provide correct value only when used with common or pillar specific dimensions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Compound.Payments to Invoice Amount %

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Payments Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the amount of payment transactions where the payment date exceeds the scheduled payment date and the payment schedule status is fully paid or partly paid. Excludes cancelled payments and considers all invoice types. The grain for this is metric is Payment Schedules.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Overdue Payments Amount

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Payments Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the count of payment transactions where the payment date exceeds the scheduled payment date and the payment schedule status is fully paid or partly paid. Excludes cancelled payments and considers all invoice types. The grain for this is metric is Payment Schedules.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Overdue Payments Count

presentationColumns.name: On Time Payments Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the amount of payment transactions where the payment date is lesser than or equal to the scheduled payment date and payment schedule is fully paid. Excludes cancelled payments and considers all invoice types. The grain for this is metric is Payment Schedules.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.On Time Payments Amount

presentationColumns.name: On Time Payments Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the count of payment transactions where payment date is lesser than or equal to scheduled payment date and payment schedule is fully paid. Excludes cancelled payments and considers all invoice types. The grain for this is metric is Payment Schedules.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.On Time Payments Count

presentationColumns.name: Total Paid Installments Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Overdue Payments Count + On Time Payments Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Total Payment Count

presentationColumns.name: On Time Payment Performance %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (On Time Payments Count / Total Payments Count) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.On Time Payment Performance %

presentationColumns.name: Total Payment Days
presentationColumns.description: Shows the total payment days for fully paid invoices and considers all invoice types. Payment days is computed as follows: Payment date - Invoice date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Total Payment Days

presentationColumns.name: Avg Supplier Payment Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total Payment Days / Total Payment Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Avg Supplier Payment Days

presentationColumns.name: Weighted Avg Supplier Payment Days
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total Payment Days times Payment Amount / Total Payment Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Weighted Avg Supplier Payment Days

presentationColumns.name: Interest Penalties Paid
presentationColumns.description: Shows the payment amount for invoices with the Interest invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Interest Penalties Paid

presentationColumns.name: % Interest Penalties Paid
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Interest Penalties Paid / Payments Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.% Interest Penalties Paid

presentationColumns.name: Electronic Payment Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the paid invoice amount using electronic payment method.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Electronic Payment Amount

presentationColumns.name: % Electronic Payment Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Electronic Payment Amount / Payments Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.% Electronic Payment Amount

presentationColumns.name: Discount Taken Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the discount amount taken for the invoice payments
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Discount Taken Amount

presentationColumns.name: Discount Taken %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Discount Taken Amount / Total Transaction Amount) * 100. This metric will provide correct value only when used with common or pillar specific dimensions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Compound.Discount Taken %

presentationColumns.name: Payment Exchange Loss(Gain) Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the payment exchange loss or gain amount for the invoices and grain is payments or check number.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Payment Exchange Loss(Gain) Amount

presentationColumns.name: Discount Taken Exchange Loss(Gain) Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the discount taken exchange loss or gain amount for the invoices and grain is payments or check number.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Discount Taken Exchange Loss(Gain) Amount
